data.name: translation.odf2oox.audioVideoTypeImage
data.value: Snapshot for Audio/Video Image in Slide replaced by thumbnail of last slide snapshot.

data.name: translation.odf2oox.bulletTypeCustomBullet
data.value: Custom Bullet replaced with Simple Bullet in Slide.

data.name: translation.odf2oox.bulletTypeLevel10
data.value: 10th level is converted to 9th (last) level.

data.name: translation.odf2oox.bulletTypeSlideMasterCustomBullet
data.value: Custom Bullet replaced with Simple Bullet in Slide Master.

data.name: translation.odf2oox.handOutMasterTypeThumbNail
data.value: Thumbnails in Handout Page, representing slides cannot be resized. Only six slides handouts available. Handout Page Orientation not mapped.

data.name: translation.odf2oox.notesMasterMultipleToSingle
data.value: Multiple Notes Master replaced by single Notes Master for each Slide.

data.name: translation.odf2oox.notesTypeShapesInNotes
data.value: Shapes in Notes cannot be retained.

data.name: translation.odf2oox.shapeTopBottomWrapping
data.value: Shape Text aligned top and bottom with wrap is not resized.

data.name: translation.odf2oox.slideShowSettingsTransitionOnClick
data.value: 'Transition on Click' during Slide Show cannot be retained.

data.name: translation.odf2oox.slideShowSettingsTypeMouseAsPen
data.value: 'Show Mouse Pointer As Pen' during Slide Show cannot be retained.

data.name: translation.odf2oox.slideShowSettingsTypeNavigator
data.value: 'Display Navigator' during Slide Show cannot be retained.

data.name: translation.odf2oox.slideShowSettingsTypePauseGreaterThanZero
data.value: ‘Delay in presenting slides in loop’ during Slide Show cannot be retained.

data.name: translation.odf2oox.slideShowSettingsTypePresentationOnTop
data.value: 'Set Presentation On Top' during Slide Show cannot be retained.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.bulletTypeCustomBullet
data.value: Custom Bullet replaced with Simple Bullet in Slide.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.bulletTypeSlideMasterCustomBullet
data.value: Custom Bullet replaced with Simple Bullet in Slide Master.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.groupingTypeExtensionChange
data.value: Grouping loss due to object's extension property changed.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.handOutMasterTypeOrientation
data.value: Handout Page Orientation cannot be retained.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.hyperlinkTypeRelativePath
data.value: Links to applications only work if the applications are located in standard folders, e.g. WINDOWS, or in the same folder as the presentation.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.layoutsToSlideMappingTypeLines
data.value: All Line properties in Layout are mapped to Slide.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.layoutsToSlideMappingTypePicture
data.value: All Picture properties in Layout are mapped to Slide.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.layoutsToSlideMappingTypeShapes
data.value: Shape properties in Layout are mapped to Slide.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.notesMasterSingleToMultiple
data.value: Single Notes Master replaced by multiple Notes Master for each Slide.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.pictureTypeProperties
data.value: Picture property not converted.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.shapesTypeArrowHeadTailSize
data.value: Head and Tail size of Arrows calculated approximately due to mapping not available.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.shapesTypeBentArrow
data.value: Shape 'Bent Arrow' cannot be retained and is converted to shape 'Corner Arrow'.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.shapesTypeChord
data.value: Shape 'Chord' type cannot be retained and is converted to shape 'Ellipse'.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.shapesTypeCurvedLeftRightUpDownArrow
data.value: Shape Curved Arrow(Left, Right, Up, Down) cannot be retained and is converted to Shape Circular Arrow

data.name: translation.oox2odf.shapesTypeInnerShadow
data.value: Inner/Perspective shadow for a shape cannot be retained.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.shapesTypeOuterShadow
data.value: Blur and Size properties are not supported in ODP.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.shapesTypeSnipSingleCornerRectangle
data.value: Shape 'Snip Single Corner Rectangle' cannot be retained and is converted to shape 'FlowChart(Card Flipped)'

data.name: translation.oox2odf.shapesTypeUTurnArrow
data.value: Shape 'U-Turn Arrow' cannot be retained and is converted to shape 'Circular Arrow'.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.slideLayoutTypeBackgroundGradient
data.value: Only the first color of the background Gradient Fill was converted in Layout.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.slideLayoutTypeGraphicGradient
data.value: Only the first color of the graphic Gradient Fill was converted in Layout.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.slideMasterTypeBackgroundGradient
data.value: Only the first color of the background Gradient Fill was converted in Slide Master.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.slideShowSettingsKiosk
data.value: Presentation Type 'Kiosk' not compatible, replaced by default type 'Full Screen'.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.slideShowSettingsNarration
data.value: 'Slide Show with Narration' during Slide Show cannot be retained.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.slideShowSettingsPenColor
data.value: 'Pen Color' during Slide Show cannot be retained.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.slideShowSettingsSlideStartEnd
data.value: 'Start From' during Slide Show cannot be retained.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.slideTypeBackgroundGradient
data.value: Only the first color of the background Gradient Fill was converted in Slide.

data.name: translation.oox2odf.slideTypeGraphicGradient
data.value: Only the first color of the graphic Gradient Fill was converted in Slide.
